messages.content: ComfyUI-Hallo is a custom node for ComfyUI that integrates the Hallo model from Fudan Generative Vision.
What is the purpose of the Hallo model?
The Hallo model is a generative vision model developed by Fudan University for generating images and videos.
What are the prerequisites for using ComfyUI-Hallo?
To use ComfyUI-Hallo, you need to have ffmpeg installed and working in your command line. You also need to install xformers and accelerate Python packages.
To install ComfyUI-Hallo, you need to clone the repository into the ComfyUI/custom_nodes directory, install the required Python packages, and download the pretrained model weights.
Where can you find a tutorial for using ComfyUI-Hallo?
A demo tutorial for using ComfyUI-Hallo is available at https://b23.tv/SZFuzlK.
Is there a WeChat group for ComfyUI-Hallo users?
Yes, there is a WeChat group for ComfyUI-Hallo users. The QR code to join the group is provided in the documentation.
Who developed the Hallo model integrated in ComfyUI-Hallo?
The Hallo model integrated in ComfyUI-Hallo was developed by Fudan Generative Vision.
